name: Blueberry Jammed
description:
A game about making things go smoothly in an [Out Of Control] blueberry jam factory. Frantically fix the failure prone machines in four mini-games to avoid a factory shutdown. 

Made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam [Out Of Control]

Controls

WASD: Movement

E: Interact
